menu.title: Gazin Atacado
menu.description: A leading wholesale platform offering high-quality products at competitive prices, helping businesses grow through efficient bulk purchases.

gazin_atacado.projectDescription: For 5 years, I worked on the development of the internal system and e-commerce platform for Gazin Atacado. I primarily worked with React, Next.js, and TypeScript, focusing on creating efficient and scalable interfaces.
gazin_atacado.responsibilitiesDescription: My main role was to develop and maintain applications that facilitated order management, logistics, and customer support. I was also responsible for implementing performance and accessibility improvements on the platform.
gazin_atacado.projectImpactDescription: During my time there, the platform underwent several improvements, resulting in increased operational efficiency and an enhanced user experience, solidifying Gazin Atacado as one of the largest wholesalers in Brazil.
